name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 6
description:
As Cruise Director in charge, enjoy a sensational Worldwide Cruise of a Lifetime aboard the fleet’s superb flagship, USS Liberty of the Waves

Arrange fabulous excursions all around the World. Visit amazing tourist attractions in cities such as Rome, Sydney and the Bahamas. Go to Mardi Gras in New Orleans. See famous Landmarks, enjoy Pacific and Atlantic highlights, relax in beautiful Desert Islands. Help passengers with Cabins, Shopping, Dining, Leisure on board and at Ports of Call along the way. Collect Cruise Souvenirs.

Look for hundreds of hidden objects, items Lost by Passengers, Trash for Recycling. Play superb Mini-Games. earn Merit Badges for your Achievements. Cruise Director 6 guarantees 3 modes ( Casual, Challenge, Extreme – collect all ) of truly captivating, hour upon hour gameplay for Families and literally All ages to enjoy.

Play great Hogs & Puzzles, Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and Wildlife.
